DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
Removed from your deck on use and end of turn.
Kill an enemy being researched to complete it.
Discard a card and gain a bonus depending which type is discarded.
Take X damage at the end of each turn.
Gain [E] at the start of your turn.
You can have 1 companion at a time. Evolves each act to get stronger.
Only playable if every card in your deck in unique.
At the start of your turn, draw 1/2/3 cards.
At the end of your turn, deal 4/6/8 damage to a random enemy being theexplorer:Researched.
Every 3/2/1 times you shuffle your deck, gain 1 Strength.
Whenever you receive unblocked attack damage, apply 1/2/3 Poison to ALL enemies.
At the start of combat, gain 1/2/3 Artifact.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
